title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user selects 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' in Preferences > Workbench. This behavior is incorrect and needs to be fixed.
OB: The 'Build' menu option appears in the Java popup menus regardless of whether the automatic build is enabled or not. It remains enabled even when the build is already done automatically.
EB: The 'Build' menu option should only be enabled if the automatic build is disabled or if the build is not yet performed automatically.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences > Workbench.
3. Select 'Perform build automatically on resource modification'.
4. Right-click on a Java file.
5. Observe that the 'Build' menu option is still enabled in the context-sensitive popup menu.
